description: Approval of requirement for Operations Cost requirements at an estimated cost.
pdf_text:
Message Classification: Restricted

Approved. Tks.

Best,
HDM

From: Seow Yuxin <yuxin.seow@temus.com>
Date: Thursday, 15 August 2024 at 5:01 PM
To: Yu Fangyuan <Fangyuan.Yu@temus.com>
Subject: [SAMPLE AOR] [For HDM's approval] APPROVAL OF REQUIREMENT FOR CAMP 1 OPS COST REQUIREMENTS [Restricted]
Message Classification: Restricted

HDM sir,

APPROVAL OF REQUIREMENT FOR  OPS COST REQUIREMENTS FOR CAMP 1

AIM:
1. To seek HDM’s approval for Ops Cost requirements at an estimated cost of S$16,290 (26.56THB to 1 SGD)  – MAS Ex Rate for 2024.

COST BREAKDOWN AND JUSTIFICATION
2. Approval is sought for the following requirements:

Items
Forecast for 2022
2022 Actual Expenditure (THB)
Forecast for FY23/24 (THB)
Remarks
Telco Subscription
               339,488.00
                                               282,907.00
                                       424,361.00
Projected amount derived from total monthly subscription (12 mths) + projected roaming package for official duty
Bank charges (Cheque Book and annual bank statement)
                         882.00
                                                          735.00
                                             1,103.00
Decrease in projected amount Estimated 3 – 4 cheque books required
Allowance model and continued usage of Corporate Credit card for payment.
Newspaper and magazine Subscription
                         757.00
                                                          631.00
                                                 947.00
Reduced the subscription  from 3 copies to 2 copies in subsequently reduced to 1 copy
HSP
                         785.00
                                                          654.00
                                                 981.00
Antigen Test Kit and PCR Test
                         488.00
                                                          407.00
                                                 611.00

Annual Airport pass
                         947.00
                                                          789.00
                                             1,184.00
No Change in Projection
Purchase of Stationaries, office equipment and birthday cards
                         155.00
                                                          129.00
                                                 194.00
No Change in Projection
Ad-hoc Service and Maintenance
                     1,074.00
                                                          895.00
                                             1,343.00
No Change in Projection
Printing of Name Card
                         559.00
                                                          466.00
                                                 699.00
No Change in Projection
Dip Bag via MFA
                         926.00
                                                          772.00
                                             1,158.00
TOTAL
               346,061.00
                                               288,385.00
                                       432,581.00


3. Supported by Director Yong Shan. Request is lower after review of past year’s expenditure and adjusted requirements.

4. Submitted for HDM’s approval, please.

ENDORSEMENT BY AO(F) / URO

  1.  Fund Sources and Amount: Cost Centre/IO: CAMP 1, S$17,000  (rounded up to nearest S$’000)
  2.  I have checked that there are sufficient funds to support this requirement.
  3.  Details of AO(F)/URO:
(1) Rank & Name: Procurement Officer, Adam Khoo
(2) Appointment: Sergeant
(3) Date: <<as reflected in email>>
